law.catch_line: A party to a proceeding before the Commission who is aggrieved by a final decision of the Commission...
law.text: A party to a proceeding before the Commission who is aggrieved by a final decision of the Commission in a contested case, as defined in § 10-202 of the State Government Article, may take an appeal as allowed in §§ 10-222 and 10-223 of the State Government Article.
